actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of $2,626,685.07 as payment to the city of New York to assist in defraying the extraordinary and unprecedented expenses incurred during the 25th General Assembly of the United Nations.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriations of $2,626,685.07 as payment to city of New York to assist in defraying the extraordinary and unprecendented expenses incurred during the Twenty-fifth General Assembly of the United Nations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the appropriation of $2,626,685.07 as payment to the city of New York to assist in defraying the extraordinary and unprecedented expenses incurred during the 25th General Assembly of the United Nations.
